resources.string: Strings (E A D G B e):

Once you search a chord, the app will show you multiple chords that have similar names to the chord you searched.
The strings shown go from the low (thickest) E string, to the high (thinnest) e string.
The fingering information tells you which fingers should be on which strings.
Numbers represent fingers in this order:
1 - index finger
2 - middle finger
3 - ring finger
4 - pinky finger.
Root, quality, tension and bass tell you what certain tones are added to the chord in order to "enrich" it.
